https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/alter.name: alternateName

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/defin._instruction: Enter the definition for this parcellation entity.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/defin.description: Short, but precise statement of the meaning of a word, word group, sign or a symbol.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/defin.label: Definition
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/defin.name: definition

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasPa._instruction: Add all anatomical parent structures for this parcellation entity as defined within the corrsponding brain atlas.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasPa.description: Reference to a parent object or legal person.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasPa.label: Has parent
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasPa.name: hasParent

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasVe._instruction: Add all versions of this parcellation entity.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasVe.description: Reference to variants of an original.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasVe.label: Has version
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hasVe.name: hasVersion

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this parcellation entity that may help you to find this instance more easily.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku.label: Lookup label
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku.name: lookupLabel

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name._instruction: Enter the name of this parcellation entity.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.label: Name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.name: name

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifiers (IRIs) to the related ontological terms matching this parcellation entity.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone registered within a particular ontology.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.label: Ontology identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ontol.name: ontologyIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat._instruction: Add the related anatomical entity as defined by the UBERON ontology.
